section.heading: Scope of Mayor’s authority.
section.text: The Mayor may open, extend, widen, or straighten:

para.text: Any street to conform with the highway plan; or

Any minor street or alley, upon the petition of the owners of more than 1/2 of the property fronting on the proposed street or alley, or when the Mayor finds that the public interest would be served best by the action.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Public ways, streets and alleys on recorded plats, see § 1-1314.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 6-403 and § 9-203.02.

annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority under Law 4-201, see Mayor’s Order 83-139, May 26, 1983.
